alert.note: Alert for Richland; Roosevelt; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:28AM MDT until July 30 at 5:30AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Sheridan County in northeastern Montana... Northeastern Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 530 AM MDT. * At 428 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Froid, or 10 miles north of Culbertson, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Culbertson, Fairview, Bainville, Froid, Mccabe, Snowden, Fort Kipp, Homestead, Nohly and Fort Union. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
